Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Drama | Politics | Thriller
Status: New Series
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: November 07, 2012

Secret State is a drama series which is inspired by Chris Mullin's novel A Very British Coup. Deputy Prime Minister Tom Dawkins vows to take on the American petrochemical company Petrofex following a devastating accident on British land.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-33326)
